person.persName: John Redman (Harrison County, Kentucky, merchant, farmer, and distiller)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, merchant and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Cynthia Lair Redman in Harrison County, Kentucky, on February 22, 1842. Married to Elizabeth Pugh Redman in Harrison County, Kentucky, on May 31, 1848. Father of Joseph Redman, Belle Redman, Charles Redman, and Sallie Redman. Merchant in Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned four enslaved persons in Harrison County in 1850. Built Distiller No. 16 in Harrison County in 1859. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860. Owned seven enslaved persons in Harrison County in 1860. Distiller in Harrison County in 1863.
